meaningMnemonic: Jump on a <radical>scooter</radical> to <radical>excuse</radical> yourself from answering a question and you've successfully <kanji>deviate</kanji>d from that nosey person's plan! You've also been able to <kanji>elude</kanji> them pretty well.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>deviate</kanji> from the plan a little too well, and as you're scooting, what you've done <reading>eats</reading> (いつ) away at you. You feel guilty for eluding them...
